description: List the port mappings for a specific EC2 instance (destination) in a VPC subnet endpoint. The response is the mappings for one destination IP address. This is useful when your subnet endpoint has mappings that span multiple custom routing accelerators in your account, or for scenarios where you only want to list the port mappings for a specific destination instance.

parameters.name: EndpointId
parameters.description: The ID for the virtual private cloud (VPC) subnet.

parameters.name: DestinationAddress
parameters.description: The endpoint IP address in a virtual private cloud (VPC) subnet for which you want to receive back port mappings.

nested_items.name: DestinationPortMappings
nested_items.description: The port mappings for the endpoint IP address that you specified in the request.

nested_items.name: AcceleratorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the custom routing accelerator that you have port mappings for.

nested_items.name: AcceleratorSocketAddresses
nested_items.description: The IP address/port combinations (sockets) that map to a given destination socket address.

nested_items.name: IpAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address for the socket address.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port for the socket address.

nested_items.name: EndpointGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint group.

nested_items.name: EndpointId
nested_items.description: The ID for the virtual private cloud (VPC) subnet.

nested_items.name: EndpointGroupRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region for the endpoint group.

nested_items.name: DestinationSocketAddress
nested_items.description: The endpoint IP address/port combination for traffic received on the accelerator socket address.

nested_items.name: IpAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address for the socket address.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port for the socket address.

nested_items.name: IpAddressType
nested_items.description: The IP address type that an accelerator supports. For a custom routing accelerator, the value must be IPV4.

nested_items.name: DestinationTrafficState
nested_items.description: Indicates whether or not a port mapping destination can receive traffic. The value is either ALLOW, if traffic is allowed to the destination, or DENY, if traffic is not allowed to the destination.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results. You receive this token from a previous call.
